title: SWFSC Open Science Page
text:
Mirroring the culture of “Open Source,” Open Science advocates for a framework of principles and practices that make scientific research accessible to all. It is a movement that encourages collaboration and knowledge sharing.
Various tools and best practices have been developed to support the open science culture, enabling scientists to work more openly and reproducibly.
NMFS Openscapes is a program that offers team-based training opportunities, empowering the NMFS staff with the skills and tools to contribute to the open science landscape effectively.
This page serves as a collaborative space for the SWFSC participants of the NMFS Openscapes to share knowledge, insights and experiences gained from the program to foster inclusive and collaborative culture at SWFSC.

title: How to Contribute
text:
last modified 04/12/2024







Note



The SWFSC Openscience is housed under the SWFSC Github Enterprise and the contribution is restricted to the SWFSC Github enterprise account holder



Minor Updates - It’s easy!
If the update is simply gramatical/spelling errors which would not affect the content or context of the page, contributor can edit directly on the Github page.
